00021 void file_put_contents(const char *filename, const char *value, unsigned long val_len){
00022     FILE *fp;    
00023 
00024     fp = fopen(filename, "a+");
00025     fwrite(value, sizeof(char), val_len, fp);
00026     fclose(fp);
00027 }

00029 void mv(const char *dst, const char *src){
00030     rename(src, dst);
00031     unlink(src);
00032 }

00034 char *frand(void){
00035     char str[64] = "t00uAv1wB2xCy3Dz4EF5Gs6HaIb7cJdK8eLf9gMhNOiPjQkRmSnTUoVWqXYpZr";
00036     int i, start, end;
00037     char tmp[2];
00038     unsigned long l;
00039     char str_rand[9], *p;
00040 
00041     l = time(0);
00042 
00043     start = l%50 + 1;
00044     end = start + 9;
00045     str_rand[0]='\0';
00046     srand((unsigned int)(l%50));
00047 
00048     for(i=start; i<end; i++){ 
00049         snprintf(tmp, 2, "%c",str[(rand()%i)+1]);
00050         strcat(str_rand, tmp);
00051     }
00052     p = strdup(str_rand);
00053     return p;
00054 }

00056 unsigned long files_size(char *filename){
00057     struct stat buf;
00058     if(stat(filename, &buf)<0){
00059         return 0;
00060     }
00061     return (unsigned long)buf.st_size;
00062 }
00063 
00064 int files_uid(char *filename){
00065     struct stat buf;
00066     if(stat(filename, &buf)<0){
00067         return -1;
00068     }
00069     return buf.st_uid;
00070 }
00071 
00072 int files_iswrite(char *filename){
00073     struct stat buf;
00074     if(stat(filename, &buf)<0){
00075         return -1;
00076     }
00077     return ((buf.st_mode & S_IWGRP) != 0)?1:0;
00078 }

00080 int decompress_one_file(char *infilename, char *outfilename){
00081     gzFile infile = gzopen(infilename, "rb");
00082     /*FILE *outfile = fopen(outfilename, "wb");*/
00083     char buffer[128];
00084     int num_read = 0;
00085 
00086     if (!infile ) return -1;
00087 
00088     while ((num_read = gzread(infile, buffer, sizeof(buffer))) > 0) {
00089         gzwrite(buffer, outfilename, num_read);
00090     }
00091     gzclose(infile);
00092     /*fclose(outfile);*/
00093     return 0;
00094 }
00095 
00096 int mem_uncompress(const char *src,unsigned long src_len, char **dst , unsigned long *dst_len){
00097     int factor=1, status;
00098     
00099     do {
00100         *dst_len = src_len * (1 << factor++);
00101         *dst = (char *)calloc(sizeof(char), *dst_len + 1);
00102         status = uncompress((unsigned char *)*dst, dst_len, (unsigned const char *)src, src_len);
00103     } while (status == Z_BUF_ERROR && factor < 16);
00104 
00105     if(status == Z_OK){
00106         return 0;
00107     }
00108     
00109     free(*dst);
00110     return status;
00111 }
